Messages.Author: Volker Lars Jungnickel
Messages.Content: Dear students, I would be grateful if you could. please, fill in the Evaluation of the AWC course. Please, fill it in even if you do not attend the course in person. It is split in two parts https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?pswd=8TCYP https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?pswd=SGG56 Thank you very much for your support.  Best regards - Volker

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Continuation of the lecture on May 30

Messages.Author: Volker Lars Jungnickel
Messages.Content: Dear students, today it was only Atiyeh and me in the lecture. To get you further involved, we decided not to continue with the content as next week, I will be in holidays.  Next lecture will then be in two weeks from now, i.e. May 30, usual time 10-14, at Fraunhofer HHI.  I would really appreciate if you could send me a short email notice indicating if you intend to participate. Have some nice holidays and hopefully good weather! Best regards -Volker

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Next AWC lecture on May 2nd, Teams server

Messages.Author: Volker Lars Jungnickel
Messages.Content: Dear students, due to some traveling, we have to skip the lecture next week. The next one is on May 2nd, 10:15-13:45 at Fraunhofer Heinrich Hertz Institute, Einsteinufer 37, 10587 Berlin, room 023A. Btw., there is a Teams server via which you can download the slides. Please, send me an email if I should add you to the Teams. Best regards - Volker

Messages.Author: Volker Lars Jungnickel
Messages.Content: Dear students, welcome to the lecture/seminar AWC 2024. It is a journey though the fascinating technology behind mobile communication systems we are using every day. I am involved in this development since 27 years. There are two 90 minute slots every week, interrupted by a lunch break. We will discuss start and end times in the first lecture. Please, let me know any overlap with other courses you may want to attend. I will invite enrolled students to a Teams folder from which you can download lecture slides. This makes it possible to review a lecture in case you could not attend it.  I am looking forward to see you Thursday, April 18 at 10:15 in the Fraunhofer Heinrich Hertz Institute, Einsteinufer 37, room 023A in the ground floor. The MA642 room has no projector.   Best regards - Volker
